metadata.name: Aurorapalooza 2022
metadata.description: Aurorapalooza 2022 NFTs. Over time, accumulation of these tokens with future drops will gain utility by being a member of the Aurorapalooza Community. You will be able to contribute towards decisions being made for the event's future. By holding the token, you'll have the ability to vote on things like artist line-ups, vendors, venues, and dates to ensure that past attendees voices are being heard. The community of holders will become our board of directors. These NFT drops will always be free with the purchase of a ticket.
